info.title: My Cool API
info.description: API documentation for my Laravel application

get.summary: Get a paginated list of categories
get.description: Returns a paginated list of categories, with optional search.

post.description: Creates a new category with a name, slug, and description.

get.summary: Get details of a single category
get.description: Fetch a single category by its ID or slug.

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: ID (integer) or slug (string) of the category to fetch

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the category to update

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the category to delete

get.summary: Get a paginated list of products
get.description: Returns a paginated list of products, with optional search and filters.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search products by name or other attributes

post.description: This endpoint allows the creation of a new product record, including multiple image uploads.

category_id.description: The ID of the product's category.

sub_category_id.description: The ID of the product's sub-category.

get.summary: Get a single product by ID or slug
get.description: Fetch a product by its numeric ID or slug string.

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: ID (integer) or slug (string) of the product

put.description: This endpoint updates an existing product record, including new images. The request uses the PUT HTTP method.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the product to update.

images[].description: An array of additional images to upload (optional).

delete.description: This endpoint deletes a product record and all its associated media.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the product to delete.

get.summary: Get a paginated list of subcategories

post.description: Creates a new subcategory with name, slug, description, and category_id.

get.summary: Get a single subcategory by ID or slug
get.description: Fetch a subcategory by its numeric ID or slug string.

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: ID (integer) or slug (string) of the subcategory
